snippet: The police official Nasir Hameed said the eight officials were detained late Saturday after a raid at a Lahore hotel, but he refused to elaborate on the nature of the charges.
abstract: Eight Pakistani field hockey officials appear in court on gambling charges; gambling is illegal in Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: The police official Nasir Hameed said the eight officials were detained late Saturday after a raid at a Lahore hotel, but he refused to elaborate on the nature of the charges.

headline.main: Pakistani Field Hockey Officials Face Gambling Charges
